title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: U.S. college is first to decline federal science grants because of new DEI language
items.description: Williams College says NSF and NIH requirement related to discrimination “undermines” academic freedom

items.title: ‘A big win’: Dubious statistical results are becoming less common in psychology
items.description: Fewer papers are reporting findings on the border of statistical significance, a potential marker of dodgy research practices

items.title: U.S. military trims access to its critical sea ice measurements
items.description: Data gaps come as Arctic sea ice shrinks to near-record lows

items.title: 600 years before Europeans arrived, Great Lakes farmers transformed the land
items.description: Despite poor conditions, Indigenous growers used innovative techniques to grow large crops of corn, beans, and squash

items.title: Local predictions of climate change are hazy. But cities need answers fast
items.description: Scientists are figuring out where “downscaled” climate models struggle—and how they can be improved

items.title: Race, ethnicity don’t match genetic ancestry, according to a large U.S. study
items.description: Data from the All of Us program confirm what many geneticists have long promoted

items.title: Watch a tower of worms wriggle like a single organism
items.description: Scientists film nematodes forming a superorganism in the wild for the first time

items.title: New National Academies board will wade into math wars
items.description: Gates Foundation grant enables cash-strapped body to create unit seeking to bridge gap between mathematicians and math educators

items.title: Some Dead Sea Scrolls are older than researchers thought, AI analysis suggests
items.description: But overall, machine learning approach closely matches what human scholars had long suspected about ancient documents

items.title: African countries fall far short of mpox vaccination targets
items.description: Continent faces a shortage of doses and distribution challenges
